title: Celanese 's revenue 2007 to 2018
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Revenue in million U.S. dollars, with a total of 12 data points. The chart has 5 significant trends.
The longest trend is moderately positive which exists from 2012 to 2009.
Likewise, the next significant trend is extremely positive which exists from 2018 to 2016.
Likewise, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2016 to 2014.
On the contrary, the next significant trend is moderately positive which exists from 2014 to 2012.
Likewise, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2009 to 2007.
gold: This statistic shows Celanese 's revenue between 2007 and 2018 . Celanese Corporation is a U.S.-based technology and specialty materials company . In 2018 , the corporation made some 7.15 billion U.S. dollars of revenue .
